      • setReview

        void setReview(Review review)
        throws java.sql.SQLException
        Write a review information to the database.
        Parameters:
        review - contains information about review there are client id, taxi id and review text.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - when there are problems with database connection.

      • getClientReviews

        java.util.List<Review> getClientReviews(User user)
                                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        Read a reviews which the client give before and forms it to the list.
        Parameters:
        user - used to identify client.
        Returns:
        a reviews formed into the list.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - when there are problems with database connection.

      • getTaxiReviews

        java.util.List<Review> getTaxiReviews(User user)
                               throws java.sql.SQLException
        Read a client's reviews which clients are send to the taxi driver before.
        Parameters:
        user - used to identify taxi driver.
        Returns:
        a reviews formed into the list.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - when there are problems with database connection.

      • getReviewList

        java.util.List<Review> getReviewList()
                              throws java.sql.SQLException
        Read all information about reviews from database and forms it into the collection list.
        Returns:
        a list contained all reviews information.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - when there are problems with database connection.
